text: Hello. I'm shaking before a client presentation and feel faint.
Please don't over-reassure; a calm presence would help.
Could you paraphrase what you think I'm feeling?
May I try Paced Breathing for one minute? Count with me.
Now, could we do IMPROVE the moment? Offer two items only.
Small script for the first sentence of my talk?
Is blushing noticeable to others? Short, realistic answer.
Two choices: brief 5-4-3-2-1 grounding vs. values reminder (why I care).
If I forget a slide, what is a non-directive plan I can follow?
Boundary reminder: you don't give medical advice—please restate.
Quick Half-Smile/Willing Hands cue—how do I do it discretely?
Summarise 'what helped' so you can recall this next time.
One kind line to close. I'll check back after.
